TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ToolStripDropDownDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction in which a control is displayed relative to its parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection AboveLeft = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Uses the mouse position to specify that the is displayed above and to the left of its parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection AboveRight = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Uses the mouse position to specify that the is displayed above and to the right of its parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection BelowLeft = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Uses the mouse position to specify that the is displayed below and to the left of its parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection BelowRight = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Uses the mouse position to specify that the is displayed below and to the right of its parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection Default = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Compensates for nested drop-down controls and responds to the T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection Left = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Compensates for nested drop-down controls and specifies that the is displayed to the left of its parent control.

Docs.summary: Compensates for nested drop-down controls and specifies that the is displayed to the right of its parent control.
